name: Barbarian
description: A tall human tribesman strides through a blizzard, draped in fur and hefting his axe. He laughs as he charges toward the frost giant who dared poach his people's elk herd.

name: Bard
description: Humming as she traces her fingers over an ancient monument in a long-forgotten ruin

name: Cleric
description: Arms and eyes upraised toward the sun and a prayer on his lips

name: Druid
description: Holding high a gnarled staff wreathed with holly

name: Fighter
description: A human in clanging plate armor holds her shield before her as she runs toward the massed goblins.

name: Monk
description: Her fists a blur as they deflect an incoming hail of arrows.

name: Paladin
description: Clad in plate armor that gleams in the sunlight despite the dust and grime of long travel.

name: Ranger
description: Rough and wild looking, a human stalks alone through the shadows of trees, hunting the orcs he knows are planning a raid on a nearby farm.

name: Rogue
description: Signaling for her companions to wait, a halfling creeps forward through the dungeon hall.

name: Sorcerer
description: Golden eyes flashing, a human stretches out her hand and unleashes the dragonfire that burns in her veins.

name: Warlock
description: With a pseudodragon curled on his shoulder, a young elf in golden robes smiles warmly.

name: Wizard
description: Clad in the silver robes that denote her station.
